item.name: Peanut Butter Cookie
item.item1: 1. Mix sugars, peanut butter, shortening, butter and egg in large bowl.
Cover and refrigerate about 2 hours or until firm.
3. Shape dough into 1 1/4-inch balls. Place about 3 inches apart on
ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten in crisscross pattern with fork
4. Bake 9 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown. Cool 5 minutes;
remove from cookie sheet.Cool on wire rack.
